name: 1984 Tanzania 2m Temperature Yearly Average (Copernicus)
description: A raster dataset with yearly averages of the 2m temperature from the ERA 5 renanalysis data from Copernicus satellite sensors for Tanzania. ERA5 is the fifth generation ECMWF reanalysis for the global climate and weather for the past 8 decades. Data is available from 1940 onwards. ERA5 replaces the ERA-Interim reanalysis.

about.name: ETL process for 1984 Tanzania 2m Temperature Yearly Average (Copernicus)

potentialAction.name: Pseudo Code
potentialAction.description:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp/{download,etl} && cd /data/tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# clone a git repo and run the code# save netcdf as tif
cd download
gdal_translate NETCDF:tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp.nc:2m_temperature tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp.tif
cd ..


#########
# Step 2 - SQL script (pseudo code):
####

# load raster into postGIS with:
    raster2pgsql -s 4326 -d -C -I -t auto tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp.tif -F tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp > load_raster.sql
psql <connection options> < load_raster.sql
rm load_raster.sql

# Move into corrrect directory and create derivative directory in data package on osgeo
cd /data/tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp/
mkdir -p derived

export PGPASSWORD=SuperSecret
# Move into correct directory
cd /data/tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp/

export PGPASSWORD=SuperSecret

about.name: ETL process for 1984 Tanzania 2m Temperature Yearly Average (Copernicus)

instrument.featureList: python copernicus_aggregate.py '{"table": "tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp", "extension": "zip", "extent": "29|-12|41|-0.8", "attributes": "2m_temperature;Average yearly 2m temperature in Kelvin from Copernicus reanalysis era5 single levels;Copernicus;float;Kelvin;9523;287.315857;301.010986;1984-01-01;1984-12-31;35814756;2m_temperature@tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp", "bands": "t2m", "format": "nc"}' 1984
